sentences: Paljusid keeli kõnelevad inimesed elavad Aafrikas.
Bantu paljusid on laialt levinud Kesk- ja Lõuna-Aafrikas.
context: The word 'paljusid' is the partitive plural form of 'paljud' (many/much) in Estonian, used here specifically to refer to many Bantu languages. It follows the noun 'bantu' which means 'Bantu languages', so together 'bantu paljusid' means 'many Bantu languages'. This word appears to be from educational or linguistic content discussing African language families.
